headline: Rockwell Automation Introduces PointMax I/O to Empower Flexible Industrial System Design and Reduce Operational Complexity
summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today announced the release of PointMax™ I/O, a flexible remote input/output (I/O) system designed to help manufacturers tackle the growing complexity of modern industrial operations.

headline: RSPN: Industrials Dashboard For June
summary: This is the June 2025 series for our monthly industrials stock dashboard. Read which nine stocks were undervalued compared to their peers.
